analysisClass.name: IPS-scores in SNPs
analysisClass.description: This analysis calculates IPS-scores in SNPs

analysisClass.name: SNPs in binding regions
analysisClass.description: This analysis calculates SNPs in binding regions

analysisClass.name: SNP regions in genome
analysisClass.description: This analysis finds SNP regions in genome

analysisClass.name: Gathering genome statistics
analysisClass.description: Preliminary identification of the auxiliary information about genome (creation of tracks: '_chromosomeGaps', '_chromosomeLengths', '_genes', 'summaryOfGenes')

analysisClass.name: Fantom analysis
analysisClass.description: Analysis of FANTOM expression values by using GTRD peaks

analysisClass.name: RNA-Seq analysis
analysisClass.description: Analysis of RNA-Seq data. Correspondence between expression levels and GTRD ChIP-Seq peaks

analysisClass.name: GTRD analysis
analysisClass.description: Analysis of GTRD peaks

analysisClass.name: GTRD analysis advanced
analysisClass.description: Analysis of GTRD peaks

analysisClass.name: Merge binding regions for cell-lines
analysisClass.description: Create cell-specific tracks with merged binding regions (creation of tables: 'bindingRegions_in_[CellLine*]')

analysisClass.name: Convert files to tracks
analysisClass.description: Convert fixed files in given folder to tracks and write them into another folder

analysisClass.name: Matrix comparison
analysisClass.description: Comparison of matrices by given site model type

analysisClass.name: ROC-curves in overlapped ChIP-Seq peaks
analysisClass.description: Create ROC-curves in overlapped ChIP-Seq peaks (when there are several peaks sets for given Tf-class)

analysisClass.name: Peak finders comparison
analysisClass.description: Comparison of two peak finders (for example, MACS and SISSRs): lengths and numbers of TF-binding regions are compared

analysisClass.name: Binding regions summary
analysisClass.description: Summary of binding regions, density of overlaps (creation of tables: 'summaryOfBindingRegions', 'densityOfBindingRegionOverlaps', 'chart_densityOfBindingRegionOverlaps')

analysisClass.name: Mixture of normal components
analysisClass.description: Mixture of normal components for maximal IPS scores predicted in binding regions (singleTrack) of given tfClass (charts table is created)

analysisClass.name: Create matrix by mixture of normal components
analysisClass.description: Calculation of matrix by using mixture of normal components for maximal IPS scores

analysisClass.name: Cistrome construction by MT
analysisClass.description: Cistrome construction using master-track

analysisClass.name: Cistrom construction
analysisClass.description: Cistrom construction

analysisClass.name: Cistrom construction advanced
analysisClass.description: Cistrom construction advanced

analysisClass.name: Matrix derivation
analysisClass.description: Calculation of matrices by using mixture of normal components for scores of best sites in given sequence sample

analysisClass.name: Matrix derivation advanced
analysisClass.description: Calculation of matrices by using mixture of normal components for RA-scores of best sites in given sequence sample

analysisClass.name: Transform track to table
analysisClass.description: Create data matrix with sequence sample and/or values of variables that are dynamic properties of sites in track

analysisClass.name: Cis-module identification
analysisClass.description: Cis-module identification (type-1 and type-2)

analysisClass.name: Count olig frequencies
analysisClass.description: Count olig frequencies in binding regions

analysisClass.name: Summary on AUCs
analysisClass.description: Generate summary on AUCs: multiple comparison of ROC curves

analysisClass.name: IPS prediction
analysisClass.description: IPS-prediction and tag density

analysisClass.name: IPS ROC-curves
analysisClass.description: ROC-curves: influence of common score threshold on IPSSiteModel (or logIPSSiteModel) in merged binding regions

analysisClass.name: ChIP-Seq characteristics distribution
analysisClass.description: Distribution of ChIP-Seq characteristics using peak-finder (MACS or SISSRs) result as the input

analysisClass.name: Identification of cis-regulatory modules with given pattern of TF-classes
analysisClass.description: Identification of cis-regulatory modules with given pattern of TF-classes

analysisClass.name: Cis-module sets near given genes
analysisClass.description: Frequencies of TF-classes in two sets of cis-regulatory modules that locate near given genes

analysisClass.name: TF binding sites prediction in genome or track
analysisClass.description: Prediction of TF-binding sites of given TF in whole genome or in given chromosome fragment or in ChIP-Seq dataset. Sites are predicted by different PWM-methods

analysisClass.name: Filtration of predicted sites by filters
analysisClass.description: Filtration of predicted sites by filters (such as histone modifications)

analysisClass.name: Identification of composite elements by filters
analysisClass.description: Identification of composite elements by filters (such as histone modifications)

analysisClass.name: ROC curves for best sites union
analysisClass.description: Best sites: ROC-curves; union of best sites in single chip-seq track; summit(yes/no); filtration (yes/no); matrix derivation.

analysisClass.name: Locations of best sites
analysisClass.description: Best sites: location of best sites in single chip-seq track; summit(yes/no)

analysisClass.name: Correlations of best sites
analysisClass.description: Best sites: correlation between best sites and characteristics of single chip-seq track; summit(yes/no)

analysisClass.name: ROC-curves in grouped peaks
analysisClass.description: ROC-curves: To sort and to group (by ChIP-Seq characteristics) peaks from one track; summit(yes/no)

analysisClass.name: ROC-curves in clusterized peaks
analysisClass.description: ROC-curves in clusterized peaks

analysisClass.name: Identical best site ROC-curves
analysisClass.description: Best sites: ROC-curves; union of best sites in single chip-seq track; massive applications to different tracks; summit(yes/no); filtration (yes/no); matrix derivation

analysisClass.name: Ribo-Seq and mRNA features forming
analysisClass.description: Create data matrix with Ribo-Seq and mRNA features and write it as TableDataCollection

analysisClass.name: lincRNA and mRNA features
analysisClass.description: lincRNA and mRNA features

analysisClass.name: Oligonucleotides in sequence samples
analysisClass.description: Calculation of olig frequencies in sequence samples and compare them

analysisClass.name: Two multivariate sample analysis
analysisClass.description: Two multivariate sample analysis

analysisClass.name: Regression analysis
analysisClass.description: Create and save regression model or load regression model for prediction of response or cross-validation of regression model

analysisClass.name: LS-regression analysis
analysisClass.description: Extended LS-regression analysis

analysisClass.name: Multivariate regression analysis
analysisClass.description: Create and save regression model or load regression model for prediction of response or cross-validation of regression model

analysisClass.name: Cluster analysis
analysisClass.description: Implement cluster analysis for given data matrix

analysisClass.name: Classification analysis
analysisClass.description: Create and save classification model or load classification model for prediction of classes or cross-validation of classification model

analysisClass.name: Multivariate sample analysis
analysisClass.description: Analysis of multivariate sample represented by given data matrix

analysisClass.name: Univariate samples analysis
analysisClass.description: Analysis of univariate samples

analysisClass.name: Univariate sample analysis
analysisClass.description: Analysis of univariate sample

analysisClass.name: Data matrix operations
analysisClass.description: Operations with data Matrices
